Unblock a debug device by IP address: Chotsani chida cholakwika ndi adilesi ya IP
Block a debug device by IP address: Dulani chida cholakwika ndi adilesi ya IP
There is an error while loading settings: Pali vuto pamene potsegula zosintha. Mungafunike kuwunika fayilo yoikamo.

Show Time/Date on Upper Right Corner: Onetsani Nthawi / Tsiku Pakona Wakumanja Wakumanja
Debug Size Quota in Bytes: Kukula kwa Debug Size mu Bytes
Invalid key number entered. Please go ba: Nambala yolowera yolakwika ikulowetsedwa. Chonde bwererani.
Write the root password to be set. Don't: Lembani mawu achinsinsi kuti akhazikike. Osadandaula; mawu achinsinsi akuwonetsedwa ngati nyenyezi.
Enable \"Change Root Password\" to use t: Thandizani "Sinthani Chinsinsi Cha Muzu" kuti mugwiritse ntchito njirayi. Chonde bwererani.
Write a remote debugger port. It must be: Lembani doko lotsegulira kutali. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka, ndipo siyiyenera kugwiritsidwa ntchito kale. Kupanda kutero, cholakwika chakutali sichilephera kutsegula doko.
Write the default remote debug nickname: Lembani dzina loyambirira lakutanthauzira dzina lokwezera dzina lanu.
Write how many times the \"get\" command: Lembani kangapo kuti "pezani" lamulo liyesenso kutsitsa komwe kwalephera. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka.
Write when to launch screensaver after s: Lembani nthawi yoyambitsa zowonera pazenera patadutsa mamilliseconds. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka.
Write how many bytes can the debug log s: Lembani mabatani angati malo osungira zolakwika. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka.
The answer is invalid. Check to make sur: Yankho lake ndi losagwira. Onani kuti mutsimikizire kuti yankho lili ndi manambala pazosintha zomwe zimafunikira manambala ngati mayankho.
Palibe ma mod omwe adapezeka. Kudumpha gawo ...
Write any text you want shown. Shorter i: Lembani mawu omwe mukufuna kuwonetsedwa. Mfupi ndibwino.

Failed to load permissions from file: {0: Takanika kutsegula zilolezo kuchokera pa fayilo: {0}
Enter a file or folder to remove. You mu: Lowetsani fayilo kapena chikwatu kuti muchotse. Muyenera kukhala ndi zilolezo zoyendetsera akaunti yanu kuti muzitha kuchotsa.
All mail made by {0} are removed success: Makalata onse opangidwa ndi {0} achotsedwa bwino.
Takanika kuchotsa makalata onse opangidwa ndi {0}.
Moves file or directory to another file: Imasuntha fayilo kapena chikwatu kupita ku fayilo ina kapena chikwatu. Muthanso kugwiritsa ntchito izi kusinthanso mafayilo.
Enter a source path and a destination pa: Lowetsani njira yoyambira ndi komwe mukupita.
Copies file or directory to another file: Amakopera fayilo kapena chikwatu ku fayilo ina kapena chikwatu.
Moves all messages from recipient: Imasuntha mauthenga onse kuchokera kwa wolandira
All mail made by {0} are moved successfu: Makalata onse opangidwa ndi {0} asunthidwa bwino.
Takanika kusuntha makalata onse opangidwa ndi {0}.

Shows weather info for specified city. U: Onetsani zambiri zanyengo yamzindawo. Gwiritsani Ntchito OpenWeatherMap.
You can get your own API key at https://: Mutha kupeza kiyi yanu ya API ku https://home.openweathermap.org/api_keys.
You can always consult http://bulk.openw: Mutha kulumikizana ndi http://bulk.openweathermap.org/sample/city.list.json.gz pamndandanda wamizinda yomwe ili ndi ma ID awo.
Sets up the kernel so it prompts you for: Ikani kernel kuti ikuthandizireni kutsutsana pa boot.
Triggers maintenance mode. This disables: Zimayambitsa mawonekedwe osamalira. Izi zimasokoneza maakaunti angapo.
When switching languages, change the mon: Mukamasintha zilankhulo, sinthani mayina amwezi, kalendala, ndi zina zambiri.
If the kernel is started, it will set ro: Ngati kernel yayambitsidwa, imayika mawu achinsinsi.
Sungani mauthenga ofufuza za hardware kukhala chete.
If enabled, it will probe the RAM slots: Ngati itathandizidwa, ifufuza malo a RAM limodzi ndi RAM.
Show Message of the Day before displayin: Onetsani Mauthenga Atsikulo musanawonetse mawonekedwe olowera.
Iwonetsani ogwiritsa omwe alipo ngati athandizidwa.
Kaya mulowetse dzina la FTP kapena ayi.
Kaya mulowetse adilesi ya FTP IP kapena ayi.
The time and date will be shown in the u: Nthawi ndi tsiku zidzawonetsedwa pakona yakumanja pazenera
If enabled, the kernel will parse the wh: Ngati chithandizidwa, kernel idzawonetsa chikwatu chonse kukula kwake kwathunthu. Zina, zidzangowonekera pamwamba.
The time and date will be longer, showin: Nthawi ndi tsiku zidzakhala zazitali, zikuwonetsa mayina amwezi wathunthu, ndi zina zambiri.
Select your preferred unit for temperatu: Sankhani gawo lomwe mumakonda kuti lizitentha (izi zimangogwira ntchito pa lamulo la "nyengo")
Mod {0} does not have the part name. Mod: Mod {0} ilibe dzina lachigawo. Kupatula ma Mod kwalephera. Unikani kachidindo koyambira.
Mod {0} does not have the command. Mod p: Mod {0} ilibe lamulo. Kupatula ma Mod kwalephera. Unikani kachidindo koyambira.
You must turn on debug mode before you c: Muyenera kuyatsa njira yolakwika musanachotsere chipika.
You may not have inxi installed on your: Mwina simunakhazikitse inxi pamakina anu. Tchulani woyang'anira phukusi lanu kuti mupange. Kwa machitidwe a Debian (ndi zotumphukira), mungafune kuyendetsa "sudo apt install inxi libcpanel-json-xs-perl" mu emulator yotsiriza.
Can't get information about nonexistent: Simungapeze zambiri za fayilo yomwe kulibe.
The file is an archive. Used for backups: Fayiloyi ndi yosunga zakale. Ntchito backups.
Replaces a word or phrase with another o: M'malo mwa mawu kapena mawu ndi wina mu mzere
Activates true color support for ColorMi: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa ColorMix.
Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa Disco.
Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa Mizere.
Disco will cycle colors when enabled. Ot: Disco idzayendetsa mitundu ikatha. Apo ayi, sankhani mitundu yosasintha.
Enter file paths to attachments. Press E: Lowetsani mafayilo amitundu. Dinani ENTER panjira yopanda kanthu kuti mutsimikizire.
Write password for key ID {0}: Lembani mawu achinsinsi a ID ya kiyi {0}
Asks you to fill the required fields to: Akufunsani kuti mudzaze magawo omwe mukufuna kuti mutumize uthenga wobisika ku adilesi
Show progress bar while downloading or u: Onetsani kapamwamba pomwe mukutsitsa kapena kutsitsa kuchokera ku "pezani" kapena "ikani" lamulo
If true, it makes \"get\" or \"put\" sho: Ngati ndi zoona, zimapangitsa "kupeza" kapena "kuyika" kuwonetsa kapamwamba pomwe mukutsitsa kapena kutsitsa.
Please use \"ftp\" if you are going to u: Chonde gwiritsani "ftp" ngati mukufuna kukweza mafayilo ku seva ya FTP.
Write how many times the \"put\" command: Lembani kangati lamulo la "kuyika" liyeneranso kuyesanso kukweza zolephera. Iyenera kukhala yowerengeka.
The specified line number may not be lar: Nambala ya mzere yomwe yatchulidwa siyingakhale yokulirapo kuposa nambala yomaliza ya fayilo.
Activates 255 color support for Dissolve: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu wa 255 kwa Dissolve.
Activates true color support for Dissolv: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa Dissolve.
Makes a directory in the current working: Amapanga chikwatu mu chikwatu chomwe chikugwira ntchito pano
Removes a directory from the current wor: Imachotsa chikwatu kuchokera patsamba lomwe likugwira ntchito pano
This section lists all general kernel se: Gawoli limatchula zoikika zonse za kernel, makamaka posunga kernel.
This section changes hardware probe beha: Gawoli limasintha machitidwe a kafukufuku wa Hardware.
This section represents the login settin: Gawo ili likuyimira zosintha zolowera. Tulukani muakaunti yanu kuti kusinthaku kuchitike.
This section lists the network settings,: Gawoli limatchulira zosintha ma netiweki, monga chipolopolo cha FTP, zosintha zamalamulo zokhudzana ndi netiweki, ndi zoikidwiratu zakutali.
This section lists all the screensavers: Gawoli limatchula zowonera pazenera zonse ndi zosintha zawo.
Settings that don't fit in their appropr: Zikhazikiko zomwe sizikukwanira magawo awo oyenera zimakhala pano.
Tests mods by providing mod files: Amayesa ma mods powapatsa mafayilo amtundu
* Press any key to start the kernel or E: * Dinani batani lililonse kuti muyambe kernel kapena ESC kuti mutuluke.
When listing mail messages, show body pr: Mukamalemba mndandanda wamakalata, onetsani kuwonera thupi.
Cached hardware probe. Showing informati: Kafukufuku wazida zosungidwa. Kuwonetsa zambiri komabe ...
Answer {0} to go back. Otherwise, any an: Yankhani {0} kuti mubwerere. Kupanda kutero, yankho lililonse limatanthauza inde.
Activates 255 color support for Bouncing: Imayambitsa chithandizo chamtundu wa 255 cha BouncingBlock.
Activates true color support for Bouncin: Imathandizira kuthandizira kwamtundu weniweni kwa BouncingBlock.
Queries a character in a specified line: Kufunsa khalidwe mu mzere wodalirika kapena mizere yonse
Checking for updates is disabled because: Kufufuza zosintha ndikulephera chifukwa mukugwiritsa ntchito njira yachitukuko.
Turns on or off the text editor autosave: Kuyatsa kapena kutseka mawonekedwe osintha mkonzi.
If autosave is enabled, the text file wi: Ngati autosave itathandizidwa, fayiloyo imasungidwa pamasekondi "n" aliwonse.
Amalemba macheza akutali kuti athetse zolakwika.
How many milliseconds to wait before mak: Ndi ma millisecond angati amene mungadikire musanapange kulemba kotsatira?
Lets you use an SSH FTP server: Amakulolani kugwiritsa ntchito seva ya SSH FTP
